text: Huexotzingo is a small city in Mexico. It is about northeast of Puebla. In 2022, about 60,000 people lived there. The city is mostly focused on agriculture. The Codex Hexotzingo, a document of a trial in the Middle Ages was located there. Today, the city is known for the producition of cider, and of fruit preserves. Also, the airport of Puebla is located in Huexotzingo. By car, Puebla can be reached in about 20 minutes, Mexico City is about an hour away. Category:Municipalities of Mexico Category:Cities in Mexico Category:Puebla (state) Category:Settlements in Puebla
title: Huexotzingo
